latest_updates.text:
Dear the Bebird Fam,

We've been asked by many of you for a demo video on how to use the Bebird X17 pro. Check out this freshly made video below- we hope this helps you to better learn the product.

BIG NEWS!!

We're also excited to announce that we are now over $300,000 FUNDED! Celebrate the moment with us as our community grows bigger and stronger.

We'll be continually updating you with lifestyle/factory/use images and videos of Bebird. Stay tuned! Meanwhile, if there's any specific feature you'd like to see us performing- comment on the page and we'll be sure to get your concerns solved.

Make sure to also share our innovation on social media. Thanks again for your great support!

Love,

The Bebird Team

response.title: Amazfit X Curved Smartwatch: Bow to the Future
response.tagline: Curved screen smartwatch with 24/7 heart tracking

latest_updates.text:
Dear friends and backers, 

 

We are amazed by the pool of customers’ feedback, with the majority pointing at the watch band replacement. We have heard you and thus developed a solution:

 

Watch Bands Package Available

We would offer a separate package of black watch bands consisting of one buckle-side band and two point-side bands (one ranges from 145mm~180mm and the other ranges from 162mm~205mm). We are still confirming the details of the gold watch bands and will let you know as soon as possible. As the watch bands are made of fluororubber, the material texture is soft and skin-friendly, which would be the best gear for sports as well as the most simplistic presentation according to most users’ profiles. The package is worth $25 at retail price but is sold at $19 with a 24% discount at this stage of crowdfunding. The replacement of the buckle side has to be unscrewed delicately with a screwdriver as this is where the integrated antenna is located, whereas that of the point side can be done by simply clicking the detach button. 

For more details, please refer to the demo video from our last update: 

https://youtu.be/vVpZOMhrSec

 

Please kindly note that this package can be purchased only along with the watch unit(s). Simply click the add-on option when you place the order. However, if you have already bought the device, you can also place a separate order for this package on our campaign page, and we will make sure to ship them together with your watch unit. The shipping date of the black watch band will align with that of your watch unit(s).

 

Help us share!

Please also help us share this exciting news on Facebook and Twitter:

 

 

If you encounter any questions, please don’t hesitate to email us at global@huami.com, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Sincerely,

Huami Amazfit Team

latest_updates.text:
Dear Backers,

Thanks for the constant support. We received many questions regarding the status of the watches and would like to give you an update. 

We will be completing 3000 pieces of watches at the end of this month, and we will be sending out the remaining orders in one or two weeks . We appreciate your patience as the pandemic situation has cause massive delays and price hikes in international logistics. But rest assure that you will definitely get your watches. Should you have any specific questions, don’t hesitate to contact us. 

Thank you 

CIGA DESIGN

Thank you for all your support!

There are 2703 backers ordered HybridDrive and it is more than our expected. Our campaign is so successful because we have support from all of you.

response.title: GPD WIN Max: Handheld Game Console for AAA Games
response.tagline: Pro processor. Pro gamepad. Pro performance. The ultimate handheld game console. Intel & Win10 OS

latest_updates.text:
In order to avoid fan noise, the Capital indicator of WIN Max

is now changed to the fan silent mode indicator,

and a fan logo is printed on the F key of the keyboard

Turn on silent mode: Fn + F key After turning on,

the fan turns off and the white light flashes

flashing period 1s,on 0.5s,off 0.5s

After being turned on,the temperature below 50℃，

fan 1 remains 30% rotate speed.When above 50℃,

dual-fan keep the 30% rotate speed.

The white light goes off afterentering S3(STR:Suspend to RAM),

and S3(STR:Suspend to RAM) comes back to

maintain the state before entering S3(STR:Suspend to RAM)

PS:the status prompt of the Caps look key is

supported by the system optimization software which developed by GPD.

response.title: The Elevated Craft Cocktail Shaker
response.tagline: Innovative tool for every home bar. Vacuum insulated with a patented measuring system and more.

latest_updates.text:
Greetings Elevated Fam,

 

This is just a quick update to keep you in the loop. Everything is chugging along with no major surprises since the last update. Last week the factory received the raw materials to start making the various components in the shaker assembly, which officially starts the 60-90 day lead time I referenced in the last update. This puts the delivery window around the end of July +/- a few weeks depending on how efficient shipping companies are operating. If any opportunities arise to speed up production without sacrificing quality, we will make it happen.

 

The positive messages we receive on a daily basis are very encouraging and serve as a reminder for why the crowdfunding community is so amazing! I’ve been working on this product for around two years now and this is the final stretch, which is very exciting! I am so thankful for your continued enthusiasm about the shaker, your support and patience. 

 

Update on Improved Packaging

 

While we were waiting for the factory to receive raw materials, I made some improvements to the shaker packaging to make it recyclable. The original box had magnets embedded in the door, but I realized that the magnets make the box very hard to recycle. I like the function of the magnets but as a designer, I have a responsibility to make sustainable decisions and thus, a design change was needed. Rest assured the packaging is still very nice and giftable, it just has a different type of closure system. I have a call with the factory on Tuesday to review the packaging specifications and then they will begin making samples. When I receive the samples in the next few weeks, I will post an update to show you what you can expect. 

 

Community Input

 

As we get closer to the finish line, I’m getting more and more excited about expanding the Elevated Craft product line. My goal is to design products that empower you to create unforgettable experiences. Please let me know in the comments what products you’d like to see Elevated Craft launch in the future. 

 

Cheers, 

 

Adam Craft 

 

P.S. I’ve been trying to grow mint for my cocktails and the Pico Garden looks like it would be a huge help, check it out! 

 

PICO: A garden in your palm. Growing is fun again!

 

Whether you have always dreamed of having fresh basil in your kitchen or wanted to grow jasmine at your desk — Pico is there to do all the hard work for you.

 

Don't worry about underwatering or overwatering. Don't worry about them not getting enough sunlight or being too exposed. Be it edibles, succulents or ornamentals, Pico knows what your plants need.

 

Get yours here!

latest_updates.text:
7 DAYS, 1400% FUNDED!

Hey guys!

This first week since the launch of TAU has been incredible, it's already more than 1400% funded! Thousands of backers loved the concept and decided to contribute in just a few days.

We can't thank you enough for this, and we are really happy to see all the positive feedback about TAU. 

Most Super Early Bird and Rolling Square family perks have been claimed, BUT:

we have received some messages of backers that couldn't get any Rolling Square family perks on time, as they didn't see our previous update, so we added a few more units of the 2 + 2 SECRET PERK:

2 TAU + 2 Docks | Rolling Square Family

 

Be fast, there are only a few units available!

 

To see how TAU can solve your device's battery problems, check out the video here:

We can't wait to see where this new adventure will take us!

 

With love,

 

The Rolling Square Team

 

For any questions please contact us at support@rollingsqua.re, we receive a lot of emails but will reply within 48 hours!

latest_updates.text:
You are INCREDIBLE!

Thank you for making the campaign the success it has been!

We are on the road to our 125k stretch goal! When we hit 125K we will unlock 3 more trading cards for the trading card add-on!!! I'm looking forward to adding these cards to the pack. If you are one of the luck ones that picked up that add-on, this is great news! Even better is that you can still add them on!

 

Here's my favorite news: ROB WILLIS is drawing a piece for the 0.5 issue. 0.5 issue?! Yes. If we hit our 150k streatch goal, every book order gets an additional comic: Black Flag 0.5! This issue will feature new art and stories by past BF creators as well as the new hottness!

 

LETS GET TO 150K!!

Here's a sneak peak at Rob's piece (WIP)

 

See you on the next UPDATE!

 

 

And if you're not already following us on YouTube, here is the link: https://www.youtube.com/user/Hirotekka

latest_updates.text:
Dear TickTime Backers,Thanks so much for your support! As promised, we have shipped out the first batch orders (total 250 orders). We will send the tracking number via email. The second batch shipment are under preparing. If you are familiar with crowdfunding, you will know there is very few campaign can ship out perks before campaign ends. We did this just because we want our lovely backers can enjoy Ticktime earlier!

 

Please notes:1, some tracking number may not be used to track now since the logistic information updates may need some more time. 2, we ship out the perks according to the sequence of order number. But due to Covid-19, some countries are still locked down. We may not ship out your perk right now, but we will ship out once the logistic comes to normal.3, we will ship out according to order sequences, therefore, hurry up, order today and catch the next batch shipment!

----------------------------------------We offered 2 FREE type C cable give-away event, ending before May 22nd. Only 2 days left!!! Hurry up, don’t miss out!

response.title: NexFan Ultra: Portable AC with Powerful Cooling
response.tagline: World’s Best Air Cooler with Powerful Cooling and High Energy Efficiency

latest_updates.text:
Dear friends and backers,

 

Thanks for your patience and support! We’ve already shipped out the first two batches of 1500 units as promised. Please note that the tracking number can only be provided after all the shipments have reached the local warehouse of your country.  We will update the detailed logistics information after the products arrive in the local area and you’ll be able to check the tracking number in the “Contribution Details” section on your Indiegogo account from thereon.

For our customers in Brazil or those who have assets/business in Brazil, we are aware of the Brazilian Taxpayer Registry (Cadastro de Pessoa Física), known as the CPF. If you haven’t sent your VAT number, please do so in the form of “xxx.xxx.xxx-xx” at global@nexfan.net. This document number is for shipping accessibility, and don’t worry about it if you have already sent the number to us. We will also update the shipping information from time to time, so stay tuned.

Once again, thanks for your love and support.

With love,

NexFan Team

response.title: TAU - The Power Bank that is always charged!
response.tagline: Always charged, always ready to use. The smallest 3in1 power bank on the market.

latest_updates.text:
Hey Guys, we are really excited for our first update!

We have been working tirelessly to make sure everything goes smoothly. Of course everything is a little bit harder due to the coronavirus situation, but so far we have been able to keep everything under control.

 

TAU is a very unique product, and when we launched we weren’t sure of how it would be perceived by the users. We are extremely happy to see so many of you supporting us and believing in this innovation, so thank you!

 

Production

We are currently fixing the last few minor details before starting mass production:

 

We have changed the metal of the hook, as we have noticed during our beta testing that after a while or if used incorrectly the current metal would bend too easily. Instead, we will be using spring steel, which will get back into shape no matter how many times you decide to change your keys. Luckily the supplier of this part should be pretty fast so we don’t expect a delay for this.

 

We have been manufacturing a lot of different shades of green, both for the housing and the cables, to reach the Agave Green as we have imagined it.

 

We have changed the dock’s adhesive patch to a softer material, as we have noticed that the one we were using initially would have been hard to remove from more porous surfaces after a long time.

 

Fill out the Backer Tools form!

It’s very important that you guys fill out the form, in order to confirm your address and color choice. Please don't forget, as we can’t ship out your order unless this information is confirmed.

 

If you contributed to more than one perk, in the color selection form you will be able to combine them into a single shipment and receive a credit that you can use to get extra perks!

 

The form access link has been sent out via email today to all backers up until now, and will be sent to new backers every two days. It will also be resent to those who haven’t completed it every Monday.

 

If you didn’t get it, please check every folder in your email (i.e. junk, spam…) and whitelist our email domain. 

Otherwise, you can login directly here: https://backer.tools

To login, you will need:

1) Your Indiegogo email address

2) Your Pledge or Contribution ID

 

To find your Contribution ID, go to "My Contributions" and then "View details".

Your E-mail and Contribution ID shall remain private, so don’t share them in the comments!

 

Covid shipping situation

As of today, a few shipping channels are still closed due to the coronavirus situation, but most are unaffected or have recently reopened. For some countries that were previously affected we were able to change shipping partner and bypass the blocks. We expect that by the time we start shipping all channels will have reopened. If you want to keep an eye on what’s going on for each country, you can check the table at this link!

 

Campaign Extension

Since the campaign has been so successful, we have decided to extend it! Note that this will not influence in any way the delivery time of your perks, we are on time to start shipping out according to the timeline! :)

 

We look forward to post more exciting news about the progress soon! Be safe!

 

Thank you for your support, 

 

The Rolling Square team

 

P.S. for any questions please check our FAQs or email us at support@rollingsqua.re, we receive a lot of emails but will reply within 48 hours!
latest_updates.html:
Hey Guys, we are really excited for our first update!

We have been working tirelessly to make sure everything goes smoothly. Of course everything is a little bit harder due to the coronavirus situation, but so far we have been able to keep everything under control.

 

TAU is a very unique product, and when we launched we weren’t sure of how it would be perceived by the users. We are extremely happy to see so many of you supporting us and believing in this innovation, so thank you!

 

Production

We are currently fixing the last few minor details before starting mass production:

 

  • We have changed the metal of the hook, as we have noticed during our beta testing that after a while or if used incorrectly the current metal would bend too easily. Instead, we will be using spring steel, which will get back into shape no matter how many times you decide to change your keys. Luckily the supplier of this part should be pretty fast so we don’t expect a delay for this.

 

  • We have been manufacturing a lot of different shades of green, both for the housing and the cables, to reach the Agave Green as we have imagined it.

 

  • We have changed the dock’s adhesive patch to a softer material, as we have noticed that the one we were using initially would have been hard to remove from more porous surfaces after a long time.

 

Fill out the Backer Tools form!

It’s very important that you guys fill out the form, in order to confirm your address and color choice. Please don't forget, as we can’t ship out your order unless this information is confirmed.

 

If you contributed to more than one perk, in the color selection form you will be able to combine them into a single shipment and receive a credit that you can use to get extra perks!

 

The form access link has been sent out via email today to all backers up until now, and will be sent to new backers every two days. It will also be resent to those who haven’t completed it every Monday.

 

If you didn’t get it, please check every folder in your email (i.e. junk, spam…) and whitelist our email domain. 

Otherwise, you can login directly here: https://backer.tools

To login, you will need:

1) Your Indiegogo email address

2) Your Pledge or Contribution ID

 

To find your Contribution ID, go to "My Contributions" and then "View details".

Your E-mail and Contribution ID shall remain private, so don’t share them in the comments!

 

Covid shipping situation

As of today, a few shipping channels are still closed due to the coronavirus situation, but most are unaffected or have recently reopened. For some countries that were previously affected we were able to change shipping partner and bypass the blocks. We expect that by the time we start shipping all channels will have reopened. If you want to keep an eye on what’s going on for each country, you can check the table at this link!

 

Campaign Extension

Since the campaign has been so successful, we have decided to extend it! Note that this will not influence in any way the delivery time of your perks, we are on time to start shipping out according to the timeline! :)

 

We look forward to post more exciting news about the progress soon! Be safe!

 

Thank you for your support, 

 

The Rolling Square team

 

P.S. for any questions please check our FAQs or email us at support@rollingsqua.re, we receive a lot of emails but will reply within 48 hours!

latest_updates.text:
Dear Backers 

I'm getting lots of questions in regard to delivery time.

We have printed 18,000 units and now working on shipping them and on printing more.Both printing and shipping services are limited these days. While you are getting your food and other necessities online, some industries are not labeled as a necessity and this is why everything is slower.I'm sure you can imagine how frustrated I am because all I want is to deliver the cards as soon as possible.I'm getting help from my dad and other professionals to speed up the process and I promise we will deliver soon .Attached are pictures of the cards we received from the printing company (Before cutting) and the postersThank you for your support and patience 

Maayan

response.tagline: Next-generation smart firewall for home and business, that's simple to use, powerful and affordable

latest_updates.text:
After 3 weeks of testing, we are getting very good feedback from our beta testers on the iOS side.  This morning (time of this message) a few of the Android side beta is up and running.   

A few quotes from our private beta forums:

"The gold has made my network the most stable it has ever been! Keep up the great work!"

"I think you are good to move forward. Like stated above I have ran into no issues it has been 100% stable, just keep on pushing the improvements :)"

"So far I, at least, haven't had or found any issues with the GOLD, there is some improvements to be made that has been addressed elsewhere and by others but nothing that should prevent it to go to production."

 

Production

We will be entering the production phase next week.  Our contract manufacturer can do things very fast, so it should be pretty quick for us to get the units out.    At the moment, we are hoping to ship the June deliverables by the end of June, July deliverables will be early to the middle of July.  

Once we are into production, we will likely do a price increase.  If you or your friends want another unit, you should order one soon ...

 

Status

1. All beta units are sent out.   50% of the Android beta units are up and running.  All iOS unit has been running for around 3 weeks.

2. We have no more beta units.  

3. Our focus now is to fix the problems/suggestions found via Beta.

4. Firewalla software is a living software, so do expect us to improve it even more after you get the unit. 

 

Risk

The only major risk we see is on the fulfillment side.  (shipping the boxes to you).  Since the world is opening up again, we feel this problem will get better once we are ready to ship. 

 

Contacting and follow us:

help@firewalla.com

https://reddit.com/r/firewalla

https://facebook.com/firewalla

https://help.firewalla.com

latest_updates.text:
Hey backers! 

I hope you are all doing well. 

We can’t believe the incredible support we have been receiving from this beautiful community of backers. We decided to show you some gratitude by giving you the opportunity to get some cash-back with a referral program! 

We've opened up a referral program on Kickbooster.me that allows you to get a 10% commission (x$19 for each referral) for any successful referrals that come through your personal link.   

Embark the referral program now and start making some real money! 

Here’s how it works ???

Earn cash to help us spread the word about Fat Iron ?

Sign up to Boost our campaign using the link below

Share your unique referral link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!

Check your Kickbooster dashboard and watch your 10% commission roll in! 

GET CASH_BACK NOW! 

Why wait? Get your Kickbooster account and start earning $$$ today! 

Stay healthy, 

The Fat Iron team

response.title: Sensate - calm nerves and soothe anxiety
response.tagline: A stress-busting wearable that boosts resilience and wellbeing

latest_updates.text:
It has been a big week for us at Sensate - we've passed 480% of our funding target and we are also loving to see our Sensate online community growing and supporting each other. 

People have been sharing their worries and how they are coping in these difficult times. We are looking forward to our Facebook community continuing to grow and becoming a place for support, education and empowerment.

In honor of Mental Health Awareness Week and World Meditation Day, Sensate inventor Stefan has made a meditation resource for all of us to use for a much needed pause and space to breathe. Please enjoy this 10 minute break and join our Facebook community for more ways to improve your wellbeing.

latest_updates.text:
Dear Backers,

 

As always a warm welcome to all new supporters - we can’t wait to deliver your new eBikes to all of you! 

 

A friendly reminder that you have to choose your add-ons very soon. 

We are closing on the first badge of production with estimated delivery in August. To make sure your add-ons are mounted on the bikes when you receive them pre-assembled from our factory, you will have to order your specific choices within the next 4 days.

 

Ordering add-ons afterwards will still be an option, but then it will possibly be delivered afterwards.

 

Referrals:

 

This week we send gratitude to Sarah with 3 referrals. We will reward her with a mobile-on-the-go, suspension fork, Colour LCD Display and our ‘founder surprise’. Sarah, you’re in for a serious ride. Thanks!

 

To all of you - there’s still time to make it. Share by following this video guide:

Looking much forward to sharing more details about production very soon.

 

Stay safe!

 

Best regards,Team STRØM Bikes

latest_updates.text:
Hello Backers!

Here is a quick update on the progress we are making. We look to provide updates more frequently. We will also provide additional photos when we are able.

Silicone Components Enter Mass Production

We have refined our designs and have purchased the molds for the silicone components, estimating that we should have photos of the molds ready in the next update. In the meantime, for all those who enjoy product design, here are some CAD drawings of the molds which are currently being made.

Skin Enters Mass Production

As we have made modifications to the sizes since we launched, adding a Kids/XS size, we have updated the skin molds. These molds have been purchased and the skins will enter mass production shortly. We will have photos of the molds and final skins in the next update.

Filter Packaging Enter Mass Production

We have finalised our packaging for our filters and they are now entering mass production. Our supplier first needs to make printing plates for these, after this, we will receive samples and include photos of these in the next update.

Social Media

We post daily on our Instagram account, where you can see new photos and content which isn’t here. If you haven’t already, you can follow us @_ausair

Thank you for your continued support! 

Jack, Isaac, Elias

response.title: La Marque - The Lifetime Brass Pen Collection
response.tagline: The refined brass pen & pencil collection. Made in Italy & created to accompany on your life journey

latest_updates.text:
Hey team,

 

This is our 6th Crowdfunding project and as usual, we couldn’t be more excited to start this journey into crafting the La Marque Collection and hopefully creating a product that you are proud to have helped get off the ground!

 

My name is Alex and as the founder of TEFORS, I would like to personally thank you very, very much for your support. Without so many of you joining our Indiegogo campaign, we certainly couldn’t be doing what we do. 

It has been such a long time since we first started working on La Marque, so it’s extremely rewarding to see that in total we have more than 1400 people that joined us on this new journey.

If you are new to our projects, welcome, and if you have supported us in the past, it's absolutely awesome to see you back!

 

 

WE ARE ONE TEAM, WITH THE SAME OBJECTIVE

 

From day one, I would like to make it crystal clear to all of you that we will be doing our very best to have the La Marque crafted and sent out to you as soon as possible, while ensuring that we maintain the high standards that you all expect from us.

For that reason, I would like to sincerely ask you all to be strict with your expectations from us, however, that you understand whenever perhaps we may feel that we need to slow down any parts of the final production prototype, testing and crafting process.

It is in all of our interest to create the best quality writing instruments that we can make, and like we have always done, we will push ahead at full pace all the time we can, while quality is not at risk of being compromised.

 

SURVEY

 

In order to offer you a simple, flexible and pleasant experience, we partnered with the team at BckerKit. This is a page where as a backer of La Marque, you will have unique access to filling out the survey to let us know your shipping address, model, color preferences, as well as have the possibility to let us know your initials for example if you chose the personalisation service.

 

 

ADD-ONS

I know that many of you asked whether you could include any more extras such as a leather case or personalization. The BackerKit page also has the advantage of letting you select any extras that you may want to add. 

The process is very simple and you will be able to add them while filling out the survey, as well as at a later stage, but in order to ensure that they are sent at the same time as your reward, we suggest adding these sooner rather than later.

 

WHAT IS NEXT?

The survey will be sent out in approximately 1 week. You should receive an email notification from BackerKit so please look out for that, but we will also have a short update to remind you.

 

In the meantime, what is most important is that you check out above the options that are available so that you have them as a reference for when the survey is sent out.

 

Thank you again to all of you for joining our campaign and I will be back with news when the survey is sent.

Keep safe,Alex B.

TEFORS Founder

 

----------------

PS. Also, if you're eating on the go or want to make it easier to keep a diet - we wanted to share with you this project from FoldEat - a modular lunchbox that unfolds into an eating mat! 

 

 

Secondly,  we’d like to introduce a cool bike lock that you may love – ZiiLock, cycling enthusiasts’ best mate. It adopts advanced communication technology & minimalist design to offer proactive protection while folding for convenient storage.

response.title: HercLéon Kribi : The World's Cleanest Underwear
response.tagline: Underwear that you could wear for days, weeks, or even months without getting smelly

latest_updates.text:
Happy Friday everyone, 

We just wanted to send out a short update to get everyone on the same page. 

 

WHOA! 800 Backers!!

Wow, everyone, we've gotten to 800 backers. Honestly, we're always surprised and grateful by the amount of support our projects receive from the IGG and KS community. It's genuinely so much fun to get to design products for all of you guys, and it's even better to know that a lot of you are people that have backed our other projects before. So I'd like to say thank you to everyone that's supporting this project; you all rock, and we appreciate the love. 

 

Here's a link to do the Pre-Survey

Now, I'm sure most of you realized that we didn't ask you what size, style, or color you'd like to receive. Well, that is because we wanted to wait till the campaign had reached halfway before we sent out a survey to see what styles, sizes, and colors we should have as options. 

So, since we're nearing halfway, click here to do the pre-survey.

This survey isn't the final survey where you get to pick what your unique shipment will have, but rather, this survey will help us make sure we have the most popular options available for you to choose from at the end.

 

Getting production-ready

Due to the coronavirus, all production has been a nightmare; our bedsheets (Jax Sheets) has been late by months, we are running out of shirts, and, until last week, we couldn't even get self-cleaning masks made for our customers. With all the uncertainty, we want to start production as soon as possible. So, after we receive the results from the survey above, we're going to do our best to get production-ready, so that we don't have to be stuck in production hell like every other project. 

 

Name changed from Fjord to Kribi

When we were working on this project, it gained the codename Fjord because a Fjord is defined as a deep inlet of the sea between high cliffs. This made us think of a butt (I know, we're strange), so we worked with that name for a while. Well, it turns out, if you're decently good at Googling things, you'll find a British company that sells Fjord underwears too. So, to make everyone's lives easier (and not to get sued), we changed the underwear name from Fjord to Kribi. Kribi is a beach town in Cameroon that I've always wanted to visit, but also, if you look at a map of Cameroon, it looks like it's on the butt of the country, so we figured Kribi works as the new name. 

 

On the personal side of things

Hey everyone, if you don't know me, my name is Wen. I am the founder of HercLéon, and I lead most of the material research and product testing. I love materials and enjoy sharing what I know about materials with those who are interested, so if you'd like to learn more, need help picking materials (sheets, shirts, etc.), or want to chat, please feel free to email me. My life goal is to help people reduce their carbon footprint as much as possible, so we as a society can live a sustainable life.

Nevertheless, I do want to thank you for supporting this project, and I look forward to hearing how you like your new underwear. 

 

What to do now? 

Take pre-survey by clicking here

Email me with any questions or if you just want to say hello

Have a wonderful weekend
latest_updates.html:
Happy Friday everyone, 

We just wanted to send out a short update to get everyone on the same page. 

 

WHOA! 800 Backers!!

Wow, everyone, we've gotten to 800 backers. Honestly, we're always surprised and grateful by the amount of support our projects receive from the IGG and KS community. It's genuinely so much fun to get to design products for all of you guys, and it's even better to know that a lot of you are people that have backed our other projects before. So I'd like to say thank you to everyone that's supporting this project; you all rock, and we appreciate the love. 

 

Here's a link to do the Pre-Survey

Now, I'm sure most of you realized that we didn't ask you what size, style, or color you'd like to receive. Well, that is because we wanted to wait till the campaign had reached halfway before we sent out a survey to see what styles, sizes, and colors we should have as options. 

So, since we're nearing halfway, click here to do the pre-survey.

This survey isn't the final survey where you get to pick what your unique shipment will have, but rather, this survey will help us make sure we have the most popular options available for you to choose from at the end.

 

Getting production-ready

Due to the coronavirus, all production has been a nightmare; our bedsheets (Jax Sheets) has been late by months, we are running out of shirts, and, until last week, we couldn't even get self-cleaning masks made for our customers. With all the uncertainty, we want to start production as soon as possible. So, after we receive the results from the survey above, we're going to do our best to get production-ready, so that we don't have to be stuck in production hell like every other project. 

 

Name changed from Fjord to Kribi

When we were working on this project, it gained the codename Fjord because a Fjord is defined as a deep inlet of the sea between high cliffs. This made us think of a butt (I know, we're strange), so we worked with that name for a while. Well, it turns out, if you're decently good at Googling things, you'll find a British company that sells Fjord underwears too. So, to make everyone's lives easier (and not to get sued), we changed the underwear name from Fjord to Kribi. Kribi is a beach town in Cameroon that I've always wanted to visit, but also, if you look at a map of Cameroon, it looks like it's on the butt of the country, so we figured Kribi works as the new name. 

 

On the personal side of things

Hey everyone, if you don't know me, my name is Wen. I am the founder of HercLéon, and I lead most of the material research and product testing. I love materials and enjoy sharing what I know about materials with those who are interested, so if you'd like to learn more, need help picking materials (sheets, shirts, etc.), or want to chat, please feel free to email me. My life goal is to help people reduce their carbon footprint as much as possible, so we as a society can live a sustainable life.

Nevertheless, I do want to thank you for supporting this project, and I look forward to hearing how you like your new underwear. 

 

What to do now? 

  1. Take pre-survey by clicking here
  2. Email me with any questions or if you just want to say hello
  3. Have a wonderful weekend

response.title: Yoni Shakti: The Movement
response.tagline: Eradicate abuse of women in yoga: reclaim yoga as a tool for planetary healing and justice.

latest_updates.text:
Dear valued supporter,

THANK YOU so much for backing and sharing the Crowdfunding campaign for Yoni Shakti: The Movement.

The response to the crowdfunder and to the wider conversation, sharing and healing that is happening over in our Facebook group (now with over 3,200 members!) has been truly inspiring.

You have taken a stand with nearly 200 fellow backers and together YOU have contributed nearly £11,000!  Together we can dismantle the harmful structures and beliefs that create conditions for the abuse of power in teacher-student dynamics.

With your help, we have already reached 59% of our £18,000 goal, we'd love to get to 75% by the end of the weekend. 

You can help us by commenting in the campaign to tell others why you felt called to back Yoni Shakti: The Movement and by sharing with your community on social media.

On behalf of Uma and Team Yoni Shakti,

With great respect, love and gratitude,

Cecilia | Yoni Shakti:  The Movement Campaign Manager

response.title: Ninebot KickScooter ES2 - White: Make it Fashion
response.tagline: Limited Quantity | One-Step Folding System | Lightweight & Portable |  Best Scooter for Commuting

latest_updates.text:
Dear Backers: 

 

Thank you for your continued support on our Ninebot KickScooter ES2 – White. We are thrilled to be on this journey with you, and thank you for supporting us all along.

 

There is about one week left in our campaign, so let’s make it count. A friendly reminder, the campaign is ending on May 28th, at 11:59 pm PT. The Super Early Bird Perks are ending soon, so join now and you will still be able to enjoy the exclusive pricing!

 

Shipping Status

 

Great news! The first batch of the Ninebot KickScooter ES2 – White are already shipped out and was delivered on a first-come-first-serve basis acquired from the order of the contribution numbers. 

 

Tracking Number

 

The tracking number for contribution #1-152 is now available. To track your shipment status, enter your email address associated with the Ninebot KickScooter ES2 – White Indiegogo pre-order at http://ap.segway.com/mailcheck/

 

Best regards,

 

Team Segway-Ninebot

response.title: MONSTER X: The Future of Portable Power Stations
response.tagline: 2,000W AC Outputs | 1,287Wh | Solar Input | Lifetime Warranty | Can Even Charge An Electric Vehicle

latest_updates.text:
Dear Backers,

Thank you for being a part of our incredible journey to bring Monster X to life. Before we launched, we didn’t know who else would be as excited about our idea as we were. Now, because of your support and the support of 1,444 backers, we’ll be able to start mass production very soon.  

 If you have friends or family who would be interested in supporting this project, it’s not too late. We’re keeping our campaign open in InDemand to give more people an opportunity to join in.

Our priority is to deliver on our commitments to you and we’ll keep you updated on our progress. As we hunker down to make Monster X a reality, you can expect to receive open, honest, & substantive updates from us monthly. Feel free to contact us via crowdfund@all-power.top if you have any questions in the interim. Thanks again for your support!

 

All the best,

Team Monster X

response.title: Support Iorio Gelato During COVID-19
response.tagline: While our store is closed we came up with some sweet rewards to share with you.

latest_updates.text:
Thank you everyone for your contributions getting us to 78% of our goal in only 8 days! We are so grateful for your support!

Those of you who ordered puzzles should have received an email confirming that your puzzle is on its way.

If you ordered a Box of Macarons those are expected to ship out next week and you will get an email confirming that they're on the way! 

If you ordered Gelato Pints you will receive an email to confirm shipment date. We want to make sure you'll be home when it arrives, so that you don't arrive home to gelato soup!

Please let us know if you have any questions or suggestions. And please share with your friends! We're so close to hitting our goal and we'd love your help to spread the word and get us there!

Thanks, grazie! Sending a LATTE love and encourageMINT to you and your quaranTEAms :)

Mary and Nick
